      • votingSystemFromFile

        private static VotingSystem votingSystemFromFile(String filePath,
                                                 boolean gui)
                                          throws FileNotFoundException,
                                                 ParseException
        Generates a voting system from a standardized voting system file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - the file name
        gui - maintains if the GUI should be utilized
        Returns:
        the voting system
        Throws:
        FileNotFoundException - the file not found exception
        ParseException - the parse exception

      • CandidateParyPairsSeparator

        private static void CandidateParyPairsSeparator(int numPairs,
                                                String[] cpPairs,
                                                String[] candidates,
                                                String[] parties)
        Stores the separated strings of candidate party pairs into the designated lists.
        Parameters:
        numPairs - the number of pairs to separate
        cpPairs - the candidate party pairs
        candidates - the list in which to store candidate names
        parties - the list in which to store party names

      • IRVBallotsFromFile

        private static LinkedList<ArrayList<Integer>> IRVBallotsFromFile(int numBallots,
                                                                 int numCandidates,
                                                                 Scanner scanner)
        Retrieves the instant runoff ballots from a file. Ballots are represented as a list of ordered preferences for candidates identified by their unique index.
        Parameters:
        numBallots - the number of ballots cast in the election
        numCandidates - the number of candidates participating in the election
        scanner - the scanner reading the specified file
        Returns:
        the list of ballots as a list of votes

      • OPLVBallotsFromFile

        private static LinkedList<Integer> OPLVBallotsFromFile(int numBallots,
                                                       Scanner scanner)
        Retrieves the open party list voting ballots from a file. Ballots are represented as the index of the candidate.
        Parameters:
        numBallots - the number of ballots cast in the election
        scanner - the scanner reading the specified file
        Returns:
        the list of ballots

      • main

        public static void main(String[] args)
                 throws IOException,
                        InterruptedException
        The main method used to generate an election from a file (passed in as command line argument or input upon running) and runs the election.
        Parameters:
        args - Optional command line file name argument and flag for no gui
        Throws:
        IOException - Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
        InterruptedException - the interrupted exception
